title: Martial Melee Weapons
content: this weapon does, it also inflicts: Acid condition, Chilled condition, or Burning condition. Elemental Age: Give the Flail of Elemental Ages a +1 bonus to Attack Rolls and an additional 1d4 Acid, Cold, or Fire damage to its strikes depending on the elemental age embodied.
